org.snmptweet
Class Environment

java.lang.Object
  org.snmptweet.Environment

public class Environment
extends java.lang.Object

This file containts the Enviroment class used to make interaction possible between all threads of project.

Author:
Nicola Corti & Michael Sanelli

Constructor Detail

Environment

public Environment()
This is a constructor of Environment Class. The new environment has got default value for all of it's field. Default value are: logfile = "./snmptweet.log" mibdir = "./MIBS" port = 1640; private mode = false;

getUser

public java.lang.String getUser(java.lang.String ip)
Find association for an IP address and return the related username.

Parameters:
ip -
Returns:
A string containing username related to IP, if no association is found, null is returned.

initialize

public void initialize()
                throws java.net.BindException,
                       java.io.IOException
Initialize the environment and check if all parameters are correct.

Throws:
java.net.BindException - Exception trown if it's impossibile to use the entered port.
java.lang.SecurityException - Exception trown if there's a log file security error.
java.io.IOException - Exception trown if there's an I/O Error with LogFile or with Mib dir

printLogFile

public void printLogFile(java.lang.String message,
                         boolean warn)
Print a new message to log file

Parameters:
message - String containing message to be written
warn - If true the message is print as a WARN (used for error, or important message), otherwise it is print as an INFO
